text:
@RepDougCollins Go home & check on your constituents who are in ICU battling Covid19 
Visit my best friend’s mother in the hospital
BTW.  She’s in the hospital in the NEXT COUNTY, because Gilmer has no HOSPITAL 
Go home and do your job.
You are pitiful
Report here on how she’s doing
#Shame
